channel.title: Posts on Markov Logic Networks in Python: PracMLN
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Markov Logic Networks in Python: PracMLN

item.title: Markov Logic Networks: An Introduction
item.description: Markov Logic Networks Markov Logic Networks are a powerful generalisation of Probabilistic and Logic Based Models. PracMLN PracMLN is a Python based implementation of MLNs. GSoC 18 As part of this project, under GSoC 2018, I plan to port parts of PracMLN to Cython.
